title: [Gameplay] Relic Shield Line - Bugged Execute
body:
While I was supporting as Thresh I noticed that the execute mechanic on the Relic Shield line was not working.

If I managed to last hit while the enemy minion was well under the execute threshold (usually in the 50 - 70 hp range) it would still give my lane partner gold and health. But it would not execute the minion.

I was using this: [Mastery Page](http://www.lolpro.com/season-4/1506-mastery-calculator#cGvBQjzTtAv)
I was using these: [Runes](http://mullinator.com/tools/runepage/1oZx91qax91pIx91qDx3)
I bought these: [Items](http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/1550666027/50691977)

- I noticed this bug was persistent through out the match.
- I only bought up to Targon's Brace so I am unsure if this happens with Face of the Mountain.
- I only played Thresh so I am unsure if this is apparent in other champions.

That is all the information I can provide that I believe is relevant to gameplay mechanics.
Also can the community please do some more testing with this so that the Developers can expedite a fix for this? Thanks!

replies.body: Bruh, thresh is classified as a ranged champ. The item doesnt proc the execute passive on ranged champs. I thought the same thing when I realized it tho xD
^ Thresh is considered a ranged champion, thus he will not proc the minion execute, which requires a melee basic attack
You don't have execute but you still heal right, cause i'm pretty sure I saw some thresh healing their adc with this item
Good call, didn't realize the execute was melee only.

I've noticed a blitz have the same thing happen to him when I was adc, but I didn't get the cs either. Maybe he just stole that cs, but he told me before that he wouldn't touch my creeps and other than that 1 he never did. He was also proc'ing fotm.
